message.body: Pls check your e-mail.
And so?
Amazing. I'll send you an email on sat with my thoughts. Thank you so much!
Kennedy: your text pleases me greatly.
U need 2 tix tonight for Pig Iron "Aporkalypse?"
I won't be able to make it until 8, but if you have two extra tickets that would be wonderful! Thanks!
Got in!
Solid!
My phone died about halfway thru the show last night, but wanted to say thanks again for the tickets! Such an enjoyable evening.
De nada. How could all those folks enjoy an audience sans usted. Sarah Yusavitz and I are planning our preliminary meeting next week.

Oh excellent. I know I promised a report on chimera today but I got roped into a 24 hour play fest so won't be able to write until tomorrow. Let me know when you decide to have another meeting with Sarah!
Yes, dear.
Just kidding. 24 hour playfest? New Barnes Museum plans to be open round the clock Sat am to Monday PM first weekend. Hear opportunity knocking?
￼Will keep you in Norristown loop, Miss Loopy.
Great, thx
Not getting any response from stable folks. Still waiting.
What is expected size of your audience?
Still trying.
80-100, but I could limit it to smaller if that helps
Thanks! If it would help for me to try, just pass on their contact info.
If I do that I've failed you.
I can't possibly see how that could be true. But whatever works! I'm more than happy to talk to them, anything to make it happen.
At work so can't talk on the phone, but I do not need the rooms cleared out.
Audience would not be seated, it's a traveling show
I hope it works out.
Thanks! I'll give them a call tomorrow
Marsha is protective. But ambivalent. You might do best in person.
I'll charm her socks off. Thanks for the heads up! I'll keep you posted....
I was gonna suggest that, but was too shy. Good luck.
*mr Santoro's name BOB. , not Bon. Sorry.
Ok. I think "Bon" is something they say in the Royal Canadian Mounted Police.
I figured :-)
Kennedy, We are coming to Vainglorious tomorrow. Do we need to buy tickets in advance?
Thanks.
It's half sold now, so they said either buy now or come early!
Got tix
You both were great! Pls pass on to Kate.
Done! Thanks!
Killer review in Inquirer!
